text: Ni na nde waba umunyabinyoma kurusha uhimbira Allah ikinyoma, cyangwa uvuga ati “Narahishuriwe”, kandi nta cyo yahishuriwe, ndetse n’uvuga ati “Nzahishura nk’ibyo Allah yahishuye?” Iyo uza kubona abo banyabinyoma bari mu kaga mu gihe cyo gupfa, abamalayika barambuye amaboko yabo (bashaka kubakuramo roho bababwira bati) “Nimwikuremo roho zanyu.” Uyu munsi murahanishwa ibihano bisuzuguritse kubera ibyo mwajyaga muvuga kuri Allah bitari ukuri, ndetse mukaba mwarahakanye amagambo ye kubera ubwibone.”
